description: Skills Snapshot - Self-assessment of current skills and competencies across technical, soft, and professional domains

skill_areas.description: Proficiency in technical and digital tools

questions.question_text: How would you rate your computer and technology skills?
How proficient are you with data analysis tools?
examples: Excel, SQL, statistical software, data visualization

questions.question_text: How experienced are you with programming or coding?
examples: Python, JavaScript, Java, HTML/CSS, any programming language

skill_areas.description: Ability to communicate effectively in various contexts

questions.question_text: How strong are your written communication skills?
How confident are you in public speaking and presentations?
examples: Speaking to groups, giving presentations, leading meetings

skill_areas.description: Working with others and building relationships

questions.question_text: How effective are you at working in teams?
How skilled are you at leadership and managing others?
examples: Managing teams, delegating, motivating others, decision-making

skill_areas.description: Analytical thinking and creative problem-solving abilities

questions.question_text: How would you rate your analytical and problem-solving skills?
examples: Critical thinking, troubleshooting, logical reasoning, creative solutions

questions.question_text: How comfortable are you with learning new skills quickly?
examples: Adapting to new tools, learning new concepts, self-directed learning
